name: Lumley v. Hughestown Borough Town Council et al., Appellants
name_abbreviation: Lumley v. Hughestown Borough Town Council

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
parties: Lumley v. Hughestown Borough Town Council et al., Appellants.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment is affirmed on the opinion of the court below. Costs to be paid by appellants.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Neville B. Shea, with him Charles A. Shea, Jr. and Shea <G Shea, for appellants.
Thomas F. Burke, with him Albert B. Carrozza, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Lumley v. Hughestown Borough Town Council et al., Appellants.
Argued May 24, 1949.
Before Maxey, C. J., Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
Neville B. Shea, with him Charles A. Shea, Jr. and Shea <G Shea, for appellants.
Thomas F. Burke, with him Albert B. Carrozza, for appellee.
June 24, 1949:
